title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, the focus caret does not appear in the first Combo 'Host:' as expected.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, no focus caret appears in the 'Host:' field.
EB: The focus caret should appear in the first Combo 'Host:' when clicked.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Locate the first Combo labeled 'Host:'.
3. Click on the first Combo.
